entry.title: The Mindful Mask
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Masks
Price: 18.00

The Mindful Mask is a combination of hemp & organic cotton and designed extra-wide for comfort and facial coverage. With a hidden pocket to add a filter if desired (filters not included), this mask has been made with flexible elastic and a one-size-fits-most pattern to enhance comfort and avoid adjusting.

Our hope in creating these masks is to provide a source of cloth masks for the general population and free up medical-grade N95 masks for medical use and front-line workers that are bravely working to keep us all healthy and safe. 

For health, hygiene, and safety, this product is a FINAL SALE and cannot be returned or exchanged. 


FEATURES

  • Hidden pocket to add a filter if desired (filters not provided)

  • Extra wide for additional facial coverage

  • Double layered

  • Elasticized “one-size-fits-most” design

  • Flexible elastic for comfort and to minimize head/face touching/adjustments


SPECS

  • 3.75" x 7.25" (height expands from 3.75" to 6.5" when pleats are pulled over nose and chin)

  • 55% hemp, 45% organic cotton

  • Made in Canada with safe hands and extra cleanliness precautions 


PRODUCT CARE

  • Remove cover, wash in cold water and hang to dry

  • Do not wring or twist

  • Do not bleach

  • Do not Iron
